body_html:
Failed for me on Ubuntu 16.04 using pip3 as suggested above:

(pytorch) udacity@ip-172-31-40-130:~$ cat /etc/*-release
DISTRIB_ID=Ubuntu
DISTRIB_RELEASE=16.04
DISTRIB_CODENAME=xenial
DISTRIB_DESCRIPTION="Ubuntu 16.04.2 LTS"
(...)
(pytorch) udacity@ip-172-31-40-130:~$ sudo /home/carnd/anaconda3/bin/pip3 install http://download.pytorch.org/whl/cu80/torch-0.2.0.post3-cp36-cp36m-manylinux1_x86_64.whl
The directory '/home/carnd/.cache/pip/http' or its parent directory is not owned by the current user and the cache has been disabled. Please check the permissions and owner of that directory. If executing pip with sudo, you may want sudo's -H flag.
The directory '/home/carnd/.cache/pip' or its parent directory is not owned by the current user and caching wheels has been disabled. check the permissions and owner of that directory. If executing pip with sudo, you may want sudo's -H flag.
torch-0.2.0.post3-cp36-cp36m-manylinux1_x86_64.whl is not a supported wheel on this platform.
(pytorch) udacity@ip-172-31-40-130:~$

Install worked using conda however,
conda install pytorch torchvision cuda80 -c soumith

body:
Failed for me on Ubuntu 16.04 using pip3 as suggested above: 
```
(pytorch) udacity@ip-172-31-40-130:~$ cat /etc/*-release
DISTRIB_ID=Ubuntu
DISTRIB_RELEASE=16.04
DISTRIB_CODENAME=xenial
DISTRIB_DESCRIPTION="Ubuntu 16.04.2 LTS"
(...)
(pytorch) udacity@ip-172-31-40-130:~$ sudo /home/carnd/anaconda3/bin/pip3 install http://download.pytorch.org/whl/cu80/torch-0.2.0.post3-cp36-cp36m-manylinux1_x86_64.whl
The directory '/home/carnd/.cache/pip/http' or its parent directory is not owned by the current user and the cache has been disabled. Please check the permissions and owner of that directory. If executing pip with sudo, you may want sudo's -H flag.
The directory '/home/carnd/.cache/pip' or its parent directory is not owned by the current user and caching wheels has been disabled. check the permissions and owner of that directory. If executing pip with sudo, you may want sudo's -H flag.
torch-0.2.0.post3-cp36-cp36m-manylinux1_x86_64.whl is not a supported wheel on this platform.
(pytorch) udacity@ip-172-31-40-130:~$
```
Install worked using conda however,
`conda install pytorch torchvision cuda80 -c soumith`
